dialogue.htmlContent:
The tunnels of Submission have an ominous feel to them at the best of times, but as you and [npc.name] make your way down the dirty, deserted passageways, you're filled with a particular sense of dread, as though something terrible is about to happen.

At first, the sinister silence that permeates these gloomy catacombs is broken only by the rustling of litter that you and your partner disturb underfoot, but as you travel ever onwards, you start hearing faint sounds of movement coming from somewhere far behind you. Realising that you're being followed, and not wanting to be inadvertently shepherded into a trap that might be lying up ahead, you stand your ground and turn to face the direction of your pursuers.

[npc.speech(Imps...)] [npc.Name] whispers, and after just a moment, [npc.sheIs] proven right, as from around the far corner, there appear the forms of four imps. One of these is larger than the others, and, although [npc2.her] wings look large enough to sustain flight, [npc2.sheIs] choosing to walk upon the ground, while the other three, smaller imps, are fluttering along in the air a short way behind.

All four of the imps are dressed in skimpy rags, and, perhaps due to the fact that they appear more comfortable flying around than walking, you notice that the three smaller imps lack any form of footwear. Although all four of the imps have impressive busts, the alpha-imp's breasts are almost comically-huge, and [npc2.she] swaggers from side-to-side as [npc2.she] leads [npc2.her] three companions around the corner.

As [npc2.she] catches sight of you, the alpha-imp stops in [npc2.her] tracks. Obviously being the leader of this gang, [npc2.she] steps forwards and sizes you up, before declaring, in a sultry voice, [npc2.speech(Ooh! Looks like we've got ourselves a new toy to play with, girls!)]

The three smaller imps flutter forwards to back their leader up, and [npc4.name] bites [npc4.her] lip as [npc4.she] sighs, [npc4.speech(~Mmm!~ I bet [pc.she] can't wait to taste my pussy!)]

Taking this opportunity to have [npc5.herself] heard, [npc5.name] giggles, [npc5.speech(I want [pc.herHim] to get a good grope of my tits!)]

It's quite clear that these imps are only interested in one thing, and as they start to advance, the third imp, who up until now had been quite content to simply wink and pout at you, puts any doubts as to their intentions to rest, as [npc3.she] calls out, #IF properties.getForcedTFTendency()==FORCED_TF_MASCULINE || properties.getForcedTFTendency()==FORCED_TF_MASCULINE_HEAVY #THEN [npc3.speech(Lucky you! I've still got one of the boss's special potions left! Ooh, I can't wait to turn you into a big manly stud, with a nice thick cock, and big balls ready to pump some yummy cum into my pussy! Oh! And a nice, long tongue for eating us out!)] #ELSE [npc3.speech(Lucky you! I've still got one of the boss's special potions left! Ooh, I can't wait for you to grow a nice thick cock, with big balls ready to pump some yummy cum into my pussy! Oh! And a nice, long tongue for eating us out!)] #ENDIF

Easily seduced by the imps erotic words, you decide that the best course of action would be to just give the gang what they want. Not wanting [npc.name] to have to endure this as well, you tell [npc.herHim] to step back, before holding up your [pc.hands] as you submit to the imps. [pc.speech(Please, there's no need for violence. You just want sex with me, right?)]

[npc2.speech(So, you know your place!)] [npc2.name] laughs, before turning [npc2.her] head and ordering [npc2.her] subordinates to subdue you, [npc2.speech(Get [pc.herHim] down, quick!)]

Two of the smaller imps immediately dart forwards, and, flying up to each side of you, they grab your [pc.arms], before folding their wings behind their backs and using their weight to pull you down onto your knees. As you hit the floor, you look up to see [npc2.name] and [npc3.name] stepping forwards, grinning in delight as they see that you're not going to put up a fight.

[npc.speech([npc.PcName]... Are you sure about this?!)] [npc.Name] calls out from somewhere behind you, but you turn and reassure [npc.herHim] that this is the for the best, before focusing your attention on the imps.

#IF pc.isAbleToAccessCoverableArea(CA_MOUTH, true) #THEN

[npc2.speech(Give me the potion,)] [npc2.name] commands [npc2.her] partner. Quickly producing a bottle of strange liquid, [npc3.name] hands it over to her superior, who immediately pulls the stopper out and steps forwards, before grabbing your chin and squeezing your cheeks. #IF properties.getForcedTFTendency()==FORCED_TF_MASCULINE || properties.getForcedTFTendency()==FORCED_TF_MASCULINE_HEAVY #THEN [npc2.speech(Open wide, hun! This'll turn you into our manly stud, with a big, thick cock! It'll also give you nice, big balls, so that you have lots of yummy cum to pump into my pussy! Oh, and I almost forgot! It'll make your tongue real nice and long, so you can get it in deep when you're eating us out!)] #ELSE [npc2.speech(Open wide, hun! This'll give you a big, thick cock! It'll also give you nice, big balls, so that you have lots of yummy cum to pump into my pussy! Oh, and I almost forgot! It'll make your tongue real nice and long, so you can get it in deep when you're eating us out!)] #ENDIF

With no further warning, and not even giving you time to do as [npc2.she] commands, [npc2.name] shoves the bottle past your [pc.lips], and you feel the warm, sickly-sweet liquid entering your mouth...

#ELSE

[npc2.speech(Aww... You've got your mouth blocked! If only the boss was here, she could get rid of that seal enchantment! Eugh!)] [npc2.name] tuts. Turning to [npc2.her] subordinate, [npc2.she] sighs, [npc2.speech(Save that potion for the next one we catch. Let's just see what fun we can have with this one as [pc.she] is.)]

With no further warning, [npc2.name] reaches forwards and grabs your shoulders, before pushing you down onto your back. [npc2.speech(That's right, lie back and relax! Time to be a good fuck-toy!)]

#ENDIF

Realising that these imps aren't going to be satisfied with anything other than sex, you turn towards your companion, [npc.name], and say, [pc.speech(You're going to have to give the imps what they want. We're not going to get out of this until they're satisfied, so just tell them they can fuck you, and try to have fun, ok?)]

#IFnpc.isAttractedTo(npc2) || !game.isNonConEnabled() #THEN[npc.speech(Sure thing, [pc.name],)] [npc.name] replies. [npc.speech(If that's really what you want me to do...)] #ELSE[npc.speech([pc.Name]! W-What the hell?!)] [npc.name] replies in alarm. [npc.speech(I-I really don't want to do that!)] #ENDIF

Having overheard your conversation, [npc2.name] steps forwards, before sneering, [npc2.speech(Hah! Well, that sounds like an acceptable tribute! So long as we can avoid a fight, just one fuck-toy will do!)]

[npc2.speech(So, you know your place!)] [npc2.name] giggles, before turning [npc2.her] head and ordering [npc2.her] subordinates to subdue [npc.name], [npc2.speech(Get [npc.herHim] down, quick!)]

#ELSE

[npc.Name] steps back, clearly nervous about what's about to happen. [npc.speech(A-All four of you? At once? I-I don't know...)]

[npc2.speech(So, you still need to be shown your place, huh?!)] [npc2.name] giggles, before turning [npc2.her] head and ordering [npc2.her] subordinates to subdue [npc.name], [npc2.speech(Get [npc.herHim] down, quick, before [npc.she] tries to run!)]

#ENDIF

Two of the smaller imps immediately dart forwards, and, flying up to each side of [npc.name], they grab [npc.her] [npc.arms], before folding their wings behind their backs and using their weight to pull [npc.herHim] down onto [npc.her] knees. As [npc.she] hits the floor, [npc.she] looks up to see the other two imps stepping forwards, grinning in anticipation of what's about to happen.
